title: What if..
body:
Runaan's Hurricane was changed to
"UNIQUE: Your basic attacks fire minor bolts at 2 nearby targets, each dealing (+ 100% AD) physical damage and applying on-hit effects."?

Which ranged champion would benefit from it most? I'm assuming Kalista.

Also, what if a new item was added to the game
*No name*
+80 AD
+50 MR
UNIQUE – STASIS: Put yourself in Stasis icon stasis for 2.5 seconds, rendering yourself untargetable and invulnerable for the duration, but also unable to move, attack, cast spells, or use items during this time. 90 second cooldown.

Which AD champion would become the most annoying to deal with? Im'a go with Tryndamere.
What do you guys think?
